short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifies the user when visiting an untrusted website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your online security with Untrusted Site Notifier, your reliable companion for safeguarding against phishing threats and unsecured connections.
Untrusted Site Notifier is a robust Chrome extension designed to bolster your browsing safety by actively identifying potential phishing websites and alerting you about unsecured connections.

Features:
Phishing Detection: Untrusted Site Notifier meticulously inspects website URLs and cross-references them against an ever-evolving database of known phishing domains. Whenever you're about to enter a dubious site, Untrusted Site Notifier will promptly warn you, enabling you to steer clear of phishing traps.

SSL/TLS Analysis: Stay vigilant against unsecured connections. Untrusted Site Notifier vigilantly monitors for unencrypted HTTP connections and delivers instant notifications, ensuring you stay informed when your sensitive data could be at risk.

Real-time API Integration: Leverage the power of real-time phishing detection services with Untrusted Site Notifier. URLs undergo rigorous evaluation against trusted external databases, delivering you up-to-the-moment protection.

How it Works:
Untrusted Site Notifier operates seamlessly in the background as you explore the web. Upon landing on a webpage, it swiftly evaluates the URL, scans for keywords and patterns, verifies the domain's reliability, and even collaborates with external services to guarantee your security.

Safeguard yourself against online threats with Untrusted Site Notifier - your impervious defense against phishing and unsecured connections. Download now to surf with unshakable confidence!

Privacy Assured: Untrusted Site Notifier values your privacy. Your browsing data remains untouched and untracked.

Download Untrusted Site Notifier today and embrace secure browsing with peace of mind.
